cleaned_text: Events - This event has passed. Crystal Bowl Meditation June 22 @ 6:45 pm - 7:45 pm Relax and restore at the cozy Little White School Museum for this special event. You will be surrounded by candlelight while the soft sounds and vibrations of crystal bowls fill the room, balancing your chakras and mood. A guided meditation will be presented to ease stress and reset expectations. [Register in advance,
